desc: Periodity - Say goodbye to period pain with your new friend. Periodity is your friend when it comes to period pain. With the help of 3 different temperature and massage levels, your pain will disappear into thin air. Best of all, you can wear it anytime, anywhere!

layout.text:
PERIODITY - BE PREPARED FOR YOUR NEXT PERIOD AND RELIEVE YOUR PAIN
FOR WOMEN. BY WOMEN.
